text: Estelle Harris (née Nussbaum; April 22, 1928 – April 2, 2022)Born in 1928 as per both the 1930 United States census, which lists Isaac Nussbaum (age 30) as "Head", Anna Nussbaum (age 30) as "Wife" and Minnie (age 9) and Estelle (age 2) as "Daughter[s]", New York City. Ward 6th Assembly District; Date: April 6, 1930. was an American actress. She is best known for her role as Estelle Costanza in Seinfeld. To younger audiences, she is known for her role as Mrs. Potato Head in the Toy Story franchise. She is also known as Muriel on The Suite Life of Zack and Cody. ==Early life== Harris was born on April 22, 1928, in Manhattan, New York City, to Jewish-American parents, Isaac Nussbaum and to Anna Nussbaum. Her career began in 1977 in the movie Looking Up; since then, she had appeared in Out to Sea, Toy Story 2, Tarzan II, Toy Story 3, and Toy Story 4. ==Personal life== Harris was married to Sy Harris and they had three children together. The couple lived in West Hollywood, California. Estelle and her husband Sy escaped serious injuries when their car blew a tire and flipped twice on September 20, 2001. Sy died in 2021. ==Death== She died on April 2, 2022, at the age of 93, three weeks before her 94th birthday. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1984 Once Upon a Time in America Peggy's Mother 1988 Stand and Deliver Secretary 1992 This Is My Life Aunt Harriet 1995 Perfect Alibi Aunt Dorothy 1995 The West Side Waltz 1997 Out to Sea Bridget 1998 Chairman of the Board Ms. Krubavitch 1998 The Odd Couple II Flirting Woman 1998 My Giant Aunt Pearl 1999 Lost & Found Mrs. Stubblefield 1999 Toy Story 2 Mrs. Potato Head Voice 2000 What's Cooking?
